channel.title: AOE2 Multiplayer
channel.description: Lol, I have AOE2 on my laptop and I am bored, anyone wanna play against me in multiplayer? Post your multiplayer IP so I can join.

ill get a bit of practice before I go against you, from what ive read your very good give me a few days, and youll have a real challange

item.title: AOE2 Multiplayer
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:45, topic:308285”]ill own all of ya ;)[/quote]You and me, 1v1

[quote=“Cowie`, post:41, topic:308285”]Pro fucking tip, never side with Niall.

We were doing a 2v2 skirmish on double gamespeed because otherwise I get bored and just slip into the darkness and because Niall got rushed by Johan in the second age with fucking 8 militia he left me against Johan with elite woad and Mepholic with elite war elephants.

Nigger is a nigger.[/quote]Niall left me alone with Speljohan.

Read full topic

item.title: AOE2 Multiplayer
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:43, topic:308285”][quote author=Niall link=topic=404526.msg3056692#msg3056692 date=1260534452]

Pro fucking tip, never side with Niall.

We were doing a 2v2 skirmish on double gamespeed because otherwise I get bored and just slip into the darkness and because Niall got rushed by Johan in the second age with fucking 8 militia he left me against Johan with elite woad and Mepholic with elite war elephants.

Nigger is a nigger.

Nice one on forgetting to mention he was continuously attacking and you didn’t help after 10+ minutes.
[/quote]

I expect in the second age you could defend against 8 militia.[/quote]

You see I would defend against that and he would still attack with more and more units, only because he couldn’t play with celts.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Me and Speljohan were doing 1vs1 before, I sent some archers & militants to his gold mine because I was mining gold there for about 30 minutes and he took over it, then I destroyed his watch tower but he took over it, again :mad:

Uh, the game ended up dropping me out for no reason after I had about 50 villagers & 20 archers.
